comments: class graded by highest paper grade. lectures are pretty boring, he just talks at you the whole time and doesn\'t make it easy to understand.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  AMAZING LECTURES  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Very smart professor. Knows his material better than any professor I\'ve had. Always saying something interesting, but can get tiresome/boring from his constant talking, without break (hard to always listen). I\'ve learned a lot from him. Unlike other classes, where you read and teach yourself, this professor taught me. The grading is very fair too.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: easy grader. only have to read or take notes on the section/poet that you are writing your papers on. Two papers, a midterm and a final, and your final grade in the class is the higher of the two. very sweet and understanding professor and he wants students to do well so definitely build a relationship with him, it\'ll go a long way.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: For such a difficult requirement, the class is nice and straightforward. Just two essays and the highest of the two is your grade. No need to do the readings, except skim the ones you are using for the essays. The only thing is that the essays are pretty challenging. Really nice and laid back. Attendance not mandatory. Lectures are boring.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: GRADED BY FEW THINGS  CARING  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Super sweet guy. Lectures can be dry, but the course work is minimal. Your grade is just based on your best work in the class and attendance is loosely enforced. Dr. Mileur is brilliant and has amazing insight that comes from his lifetime of experience with literary criticism. Refreshingly straightforward class.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Wonderful lecturer with a wonderful attitude. Must take if you study at Binghamton. Very knowledgeable about what he teaches. Your grade for the class is the best grade you get out of two papers.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Love this guy!!! His classes are very interesting. Already took 2 classes with him. Attendance isn\'t mandatory but he may start taking attendance randomly. Don\'t need to read unless you\'re writing essay which is hard to write. No tests. Very witty man! I recommend.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  GET READY TO READ  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Easy class. Two papers and you don\'t actually have to do the reading unless it\'s relevant to your essay.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very complex material, so naturally a hard class. That being said, professor Mileur knows his material well. If you ask for clarification (he gets carried away sometimes) he\'ll explain. Appreciates students who make an effort in his class. Easy grader and provides a lot of feedback. Two writing assignments. Attendance highly recommended.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: If you put in the effort to come to class, he will notice and reward you. His class goes through a lot of material, but if you put in the effort and meet with him, you will do well. He\'s a very nice guy outside of class also.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: He\'s the bomb. Super helpful. All he asks is that you show up to class. Such a benevolent fellow. Love him.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Mileur is a laid-back prof. He\'s genuinely interested in getting to know his students as people. He\'s humble, kind, and well-read. Yes, his lectures can be less than riveting sometimes, but he\'s comical and interacts with the class - better than most lectures. Do the little bit of work he expects of you and you\'ll get an awesome grade.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Prof. Mileur is a great guy. Incredibly kind and easy-going. Willing to adjust and help out his students in any way that he can. Also very concerned with making sure that his students improve their writing. Class can be boring at times, but he is phenomenal and does all he can to make it easier for you. DEFINITELY recommend taking a class with him.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Overall he is a great professor. Class can get boring but definitely go and take notes because they will be useful in writing your paper. If you go to class and your paper reflects the ideas discussed in class, you will do well.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: One of my new favorite teachers, I wish I had known him before my last semester here. He is such a nice and interesting guy. His grading is fair, there are only two assignments through the entire semester. He is brilliant and when the class goes off topic it can be extremely entertaining. Loved him. I would recommend him to anyone.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very boring and talks the entire lecture on poetry that clearly no one has read as the readings are pretty long. Only six kids show up to class regularly and he is so lazy that only one of the two papers he assigned are graded and counts towards the semester grade. Thus, if he thinks your paper wasn\'t good, you are screwed.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Take his class! It will only be boring if you don\'t participate/read. He has immense knowledge of the subject matter, and tries to get you to think in knew ways. Genuine man, really cares more about what you learn and take away from the class, not if you hand in your papers on time. Don\'t insult him by not taking your education as seriously as him.

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I stopped going to class after the first month and pulled an A-. He knows his stuff, but he just got back from a long stint as the Dean of Harpur, and it shows: he rants. A lot. Very difficult to stay focused in his class. Assignments unclear. Two grades total (m-t and final). If you\'re an Eng Maj, I\'d stick with Brit Lit 2 (vs. Romanticism).

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I love Professor Mileur! He\'s difficult to read at first but eventually you discover he is extremely nice and genuinely cares about how much his students learn. He is super knowledgeable about the topics and really helps you get a lot out of the readings. I highly recommend taking one of his classes!

tag_professor: Clear grading criteria (4)  Get ready to read (3)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (3)  Gives good feedback (3)  Inspirational (2)  Respected (2)  Hilarious (2)  Amazing lectures (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Great Professor. A bit boring at times because he will talk the full 1.5 hrs. He tries to get students to participate but the material is quiet dull unless your very interested in poetry.
